content.question: Which of the following is the midpoint Riemann sum approximation of <math alttext="the integral from, 4 to 6, of, the square root of x cubed, plus 1, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> using 4 subintervals of equal width?

choices.label: <math alttext="one fourth, times, open parenthesis, the square root of 4.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 4.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half, times, open parenthesis, the square root of 4.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 4.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half, times, open parenthesis, the square root of 4.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 4.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.25 cubed, plus 1, end root, plus, the square root of 5.75 cubed, plus 1, end root, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.25</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5.75</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
